awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 5 wins & 7 nominations.

fullplot: Nick, a somewhat chauvinistic advertising exec hot shot, has his life turned haywire when a fluke accident enables him to hear what women think. At first all he wants to do is rid himself of this curse, until a wacky psychologist shows him that this could be used to his advantage! His first target is Darcy McGuire, the very woman that got the promotion he wanted. But just as his plan is beginning to work, love gets in the way...
plot: After an accident, a chauvenistic executive gains the ability to hear what women are really thinking.
title: What Women Want

tomatoes.consensus: Even though Gibson is a good sport in his role, What Women Want is a rather conventional, fluffy comedy-romance that doesn't make good use of its premise.
